name: Sterizon
tag_list: wizit, email-device, survey-device, cardless-loyalty, paperless-survey, restaurant-marketing, restaurant-email-marketing, spa-email-marketing, salon-email-marketing, retail-email-marketing, restaurant-birthday-club, restaurant-eclub, eclub-device, custome
overview:
Sterizon is a technology leader specializing in Mobile/Wi-Fi hand held data collection and direct marketing services for Brick and Mortar businesses (such as Restaurants, Retail, Car Service, Salons, Spas etc). Sterizon offers businesses one stop solution for all their online marketing, brand recognition and brand development with Email, Mobile and Social Media Marketing channels.

Sterizon enables businesses to build strong, lasting, and profitable customer relationships. Our flagship product, Sterizon wiZit, is an easy-to-use, portable, handheld Wi-Fi device that enables businesses to securely collect customer data and feedback.

Sterizon’s integrated product suite with wireless delivery using Sterizon wiZit handheld device gives businesses the ability to collect customer input for the purpose of build eClub’s or Email Lists, Customer Satisfaction Surveys, cardless Loyalty and Rewards programs, paperless coupons, Twitter marketing etc. Online secure web portal gives business owners the tools and additional services needed to analyze and act up on the information collected.

Founded on the belief that a business’s most valuable asset is its customers, Sterizon is dedicated to empowering businesses with the tools they need to understand their customers and to create and deliver successful marketing campaigns.

milestones.description: Sterizon wiZit handheld device now integrates with Constant Contact for building Email Lists.
milestones.source_description: Sterizon Joins the Constant Contact Business Partner Program

milestones.description: Sterizon, LLC, a leading wireless data collection and online marketing solution provider, pleased to announce the launch of Reseller program for Sterizon wiZit, the companyâ€™s popular portable, wireless, Wi-Fi data collection handheld device.
milestones.source_description: Sterizon Announces Reseller Program for Sterizon wiZit Handhelds

milestones.description: Just a month after purchasing Touchpoint Technologies and making it a subsidiary, DataMentors Holdings Inc. said it will form a strategic partnership with Sterizon LLC to help market that companies Sterizon wiZit wireless handheld data collection services
milestones.source_description: DataMentors subsidiary forms strategic partnership with Sterizon LLC for Sterizon wiZit handhelds

milestones.description: Sterizon wiEmailList enables physical store-front businesses to electronically collect in-person customer email list opt-in information at the point of experience while the customer is still at the business location using Sterizon wiZit portable wireless
milestones.source_description: Sterizon Launches wiEmailList for Electronic, In-Store and In-Person Email List Opt-in with Sterizon wiZit Wireless Handheld Device
